```
$ ruby minimal.rb

$ ruby very_simple.rb 
<internal:lib/rubygems/custom_require>:29:in `require': no such file to load -- action_controller (LoadError)
	from <internal:lib/rubygems/custom_require>:29:in `require'
	from very_simple.rb:4:in `<main>'

$ bundle exec ruby very_simple.rb 
very_simple.rb:8:in `<class:Kaigi>': uninitialized constant ActionController::RackConvenience (NameError)

```

What am I missing?
